source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Character Design and Sculpting Using Fractals
items.headline: You'll learn creative sculpting process approach in blender and character design!

How to build your own creature from scratch and directly in 3D workflow
Mandelbulb 3D and blender forkflow for generating fractals and sculpting and modify character
